name: POK
description:
So we were making this game about ghost-hunting, but it kinda got out of control. Whoops. Could you please help us clean up the mess?
Join POK, the debug unit, on a unique puzzle adventure where you get to shape the characters - and the characters get to shape you.


On a scale of not broken to broken, the world of POK is ridiculously broken. We need some a lot of help fixing it. But hey, it's as simple as pressing buttons on a keyboard! Oh, actually, pressing a button. The other ones are sort of... temporarily out of order. So that the puzzles are more challenging.


The quirky personalities that have evolved over the years when the game was running are there to help you - and they'll also need your help. Satisfaction (and abstract philosophical thoughts on the nature of existence) guaranteed. Oh, and then there are the Blunts, who haven't acquired sentience yet. Yet.


...like your stubborn character refusing to go where you want him to. We apologize for making the debug unit self-aware, but we really couldn't talk him out of it. Put your problem-solving skills to the test and cooperate with POK to deal with game glitches, crazy Blunts, and broken levels.


Uncover the mysteries of the art gallery, underground research facilities, and forgotten mines under a mangled town. We might have gotten the geometry a bit wrong, but who doesn't like a few impossible triangles?
